A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Talk about taking a risk. The Last Jedi has to be the most divisive film to date and for that I love it. It really brought something completely new and entertaining. I can see why some fans will be oppose to this film\, but even I\, a fan since the age of ten can appreciate the look and feel of what this director has given us. The Last Jedi brings a new chapter to this generation. Let the haters hate\, but to me the force is strong with this film.
